TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConnectionPoint

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

Docs.summary: Provides an implementation of the OLE DB interface for use by applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For new development, see <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IConnectionPoint>.
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Advise (IntPtr sink, out int cookie);
.method public newslot virtual instance void Advise([in]native int sink, [out] int32& cookie) cil managed
Public Sub Advise (sink As IntPtr, ByRef cookie As Integer)
public: void Advise(IntPtr sink, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % cookie);

Docs.param: A reference to the sink to receive calls for the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.
When this method returns, contains the connection cookie. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Establishes an advisory connection between the connection point and the caller's sink object.

remarks.format:

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. MemberSignature.Value: public void EnumConnections (out Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IEnumConnections enumC);
.method public newslot virtual instance void EnumConnections([out] class Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IEnumConnections& enumC) cil managed
Public Sub EnumConnections (ByRef enumC As IEnumConnections)
public: void EnumConnections([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] Microsoft::VisualBasic::Compatibility::VB6::IEnumConnections ^ % enumC);

Docs.param: When this method returns, contains the newly created enumerator. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Creates an enumerator object for iteration through the connections that exist to this connection point.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetConnectionInterface (out Guid piid);
.method public newslot virtual instance void GetConnectionInterface([out] valuetype System.Guid& piid) cil managed
Public Sub GetConnectionInterface (ByRef piid As Guid)
public: void GetConnectionInterface([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] Guid % piid);

Docs.param: When this parameter returns, contains the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Returns the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetConnectionPointContainer (out Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IConnectionPointContainer cpc);
.method public newslot virtual instance void GetConnectionPointContainer([out] class Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IConnectionPointContainer& cpc) cil managed

public: void GetConnectionPointContainer([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] Microsoft::VisualBasic::Compatibility::VB6::IConnectionPointContainer ^ % cpc);

Docs.param: When this parameter returns, contains the connectable object's interface. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the interface pointer to the connectable object that conceptually owns this connection point.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Unadvise (int cookie);
.method public newslot virtual instance void Unadvise([in]int32 cookie) cil managed
Public Sub Unadvise (cookie As Integer)
public: void Unadvise(int cookie);

Docs.param: The connection cookie previously returned from the method.
Docs.summary: Closes an advisory connection that was previously established through the method.
